results.title: Metformin inhibits IgE- and aryl hydrocarbon receptor-mediated mast cell activation in vitro and in vivo.
results.text_hl: Further, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was shown to inhibit FcepsilonR1- and @GENE_AHR @GENE_11622 @@@AhR@@@-mediated @<m>DISEASE_Anaphylaxis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000707 @@@passive cutaneous anaphylaxis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Anaphylaxis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000707 @@@PCA@@@) in vivo, reversible by a @GENE_S1PR2 @GENE_9294 @@@S1P receptor 2@@@ antagonist, @CHEMICAL_JTE_013 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C471998 @@@JTE-013@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang HC, Huang SK. Metformin inhibits IgE- and aryl hydrocarbon receptor-mediated mast cell activation in vitro and in vivo. Eur J Immunol. 2018 Dec;48(12):1989-1996. PMID: 30242842
citations.BibTeX: @article{30242842, title={Metformin inhibits IgE- and aryl hydrocarbon receptor-mediated mast cell activation in vitro and in vivo.}, author={Wang HC and Huang SK}, journal={Eur J Immunol}, volume={48}, number={12}, pages={1989-1996}}

results.title: Inhibition of AMPK through Lyn-Syk-Akt enhances FcepsilonRI signal pathways for allergic response.
results.text_hl: In vivo, @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ activation by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could readily reduce vascular permeability and @DISEASE_Ear_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D004427 @@@ear swelling@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Anaphylaxis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000707 @@@passive cutaneous anaphylaxis@@@ mediated by IgE.

citations.NLM: Lin KC, Huang DY, Huang DW, Tzeng SJ, Lin WW. Inhibition of AMPK through Lyn-Syk-Akt enhances FcepsilonRI signal pathways for allergic response. J Mol Med (Berl). 2016 Feb;94(2):183-94. PMID: 26373430
